properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: She's leaned her back against an oak, All alone in the lailey O', She's pushed, and she's pushed till her backs near broke. Down in the bonny green Osireo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: She's leaned her head against a thorn, All alone in the lailey O', The two bonniest babes that ever were born. Down in the bonny green Osireo. Similarly

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: She's gone back to her fathers castle hall, She was the smallest maid of them all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: She looks over her father's castle wall, She sees two babes a' playin' at the ball.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O, bonny babes if you were mine, I'd give you bread, and I'd give you wine.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Mother Dear Mother, when we were thine, Around our necks you pulled the twine.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Now we are in the heaven so High, And in hells fires you shall die.
